Token.Abstract: PPHLocalManager provides a "jumping off point" for manipulating merchant locations and watching open and closed checkins
Get an object that will notify delegate of new and removed checkins from customers

Parameter.Name: locationId
Parameter.Abstract: the locationId of the merchant location as returned by the beginGetLocations method (or stored in some preference based on a previous return of beginGetLocations)

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: the object that will be notified when checkins are opened or closed. Note that at the moment you have to call update: manually

Token.Abstract: Kick off a request to get all merchant locations for the currently active merchant

Parameter.Name: handler
Parameter.Abstract: called on completion of the request
